text: I am driven by competitiveness, aiming to develop polished, performant, and beautifully designed applications. I strive for perfection and invest heavily in optimization, whether it's in my code or personal life. Finding flaws in myself and my work drives me to perfect my craft.

Recognizing the importance of self-care, I prioritize activities like working out and getting enough sleep, considering them crucial steps for promoting mental growth and accelerating my career as a Software Engineer.

My coding journey commenced 5 years ago with Discord's API user experience enhancement using bots. It involved integrating a back-end service, API and website for streamlined user configuration, powered by OAuth2.

Progressing further, I immersed myself in web development, mastering ReactJS and many popular technologies such as Tailwind CSS, Next.js and animation libraries to achieve the peak visual experience. To this day, I relish the opportunity to delve into new concepts and technologies, constantly pushing the boundaries of my understanding and skills.
Feel free to reach out if you are interested in working with me. I am dedicated to exploring collaborative opportunities that align with my expertise and passions.
Whether you have a project in mind, wish to discuss potential collaborations, or simply want to connect, I am always open to new opportunities and eager to engage in meaningful discussions.
